analysis.headline: Bettors Bet Big on Super Bowl LVII
analysis.summary: With the Super Bowl just around the corner, sports betting enthusiasts are flocking to place their wagers, driving a surge in related online searches.
analysis.origin_story: The Super Bowl has long been a major event for sports betting, and this year's game is no exception.
analysis.impact: The increasing popularity of sports betting is transforming the way fans engage with the biggest game of the year.
